items.headline: ‘Everyone was grieving’: Did my wife’s brothers cheat her out of her inheritance? There’s a condo and $550K at stake.
items.summary_en: “When my wife’s mom passed away, the eldest brother took on the role as executor.”

items.headline: AMD’s stock is rising as the competitive battle with Nvidia enters a new dimension
items.summary_en: AMD was once viewed as just a “price check” to Nvidia, according to Truist analysts. Now they hear that industry participants are taking AMD’s technology more seriously.

items.headline: This may slow the decline of mortgage rates — even if the Fed soon cuts interest rates
items.summary_en: Interest rates on long-term mortgages might not fall as fast as some might anticipate should the Federal Reserve cut its benchmark rate at its next policy meeting in September, according to Wells Fargo Investment Institute.

items.headline: Tommy Hilfiger parent says it still expects 2025 to be a comeback year, even as tariffs upend clothing industry
items.summary_en: Shares of PVH Corp. were up after hours on Tuesday after the parent of the Tommy Hilfiger and Calvin Klein clothing lines offered a more upbeat sales outlook, saying that it still expects this year “to mark our return to growth.”

items.headline: Why Trump’s challenge to Fed’s independence may make gold the ‘safe haven of choice’ for investors
items.summary_en: President Donald Trump made a move to fire a member of the Federal Reserve’s Board of Governors. Investors can see that as a threat to the political independence of the central bank, potentially undermining confidence in the U.S. dollar and Treasury bonds — and boosting the appeal of gold and other assets perceived as safe havens.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.
